functions.tag: {Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:63,RPG:{PhysicDefense:14,ItemType:"Armor",GoldCost:26},display:{Lore:['{"text":"Belongs to the Chainmail set.","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"The small holes in the armor sure are","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"a downside, but the iron","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"used in it is very resistant.","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":" "}','{"text":"Defense: 14","color":"yellow","italic":false}','{"text":" "}','{"text":"Armor","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}'],Name:'{"text":"Chainmail Boots","color":"yellow","italic":false}'}}
